tables.query:
SELECT g.gene_id, g.stable_id, g.version, sr.name, g.seq_region_start, g.seq_region_end, g.biotype, x.dbprimary_acc, x.display_label, t.stable_id, t.version, t.seq_region_start, t.seq_region_end, t.biotype, tr.stable_id, tr.version
FROM gene g
JOIN seq_region sr on (g.seq_region_id = sr.seq_region_id)
JOIN coord_system cs on (sr.coord_system_id = cs.coord_system_id)
JOIN xref x on (g.display_xref_id = x.xref_id)
JOIN transcript t on (g.gene_id = t.gene_id)
JOIN translation tr on (t.transcript_id = tr.transcript_id)
WHERE x.display_label = 'BRCA2'
AND cs.species_id = {species_id}
AND g.biotype <> 'LRG_gene';
tables.columns: gene.gene_id, gene.stable_id, gene.version, sr.name, gene.seq_region_start, gene.seq_region_end, gene.biotype, xref.dbprimary_acc, xref.display_label, transcript.stable_id, transcript.version, transcript.seq_region_start, transcript.seq_region_end, transcript.biotype, translation.stable_id, translation.version
